name: 2024 2nd International Conference on Data, Information and Computing Science
content: CDICS 2024 warmly welcome authors to submit your research papers to CDICS 2024 and share your latest research results with other researchers from all over the world. After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the CDICS 2024 Conference Proceedings. The proceedings will be submitted to Engineering Village, Scopus and other databases for reviewing and indexing.
